br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form

Class BaseActionForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm
      • br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.BaseActionForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoginSessionActionForm

    public abstract class BaseActionForm
extends org.apache.struts.action.ActionForm
    Classe que define a estrutura básica de um formulário.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
